page.title: 08Curry Rivel Cub Pack
page.content: In Curry Rivel we have a cub pack. Cub Scouts are a branch of the Scout Movement, for boys between 8 and 11 years old. Our pack has 3 leaders who are called Akela, Bagherer andd Baloo. There are 16 boys in our cub pack who are divided into groups of 4. Each group has a leader who is called a sixer and the deputy is called a seconder. The pack meets each Monday evening, except during school holidays, in the old school room between 6.30p pm and 8.oo pm. Activities at these meetings include games such as 'Tag',drill, tidying our boxes and badge work. The tests that we do are for our Arrows; Bronze, Silver and Gold. At the start of each meeting we say the Grand Howl. This involves us chanting, "We will do our best."
